name: ScreenConnect Remote Access
description: Detects ScreenConnect program starts that establish a remote access to that system (not meeting, not remote support)
query: (process.command_line:/.*[Ee]\=[Aa][Cc][Cc][Ee][Ss][Ss]\&.*/ AND process.command_line:/.*[Yy]\=[Gg][Uu][Ee][Ss][Tt]\&.*/ AND process.command_line:/.*\&[Pp]\=.*/ AND process.command_line:/.*\&[Cc]\=.*/ AND process.command_line:/.*\&[Kk]\=.*/)
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(process.command_line:*e\=Access&* AND process.command_line:*y\=Guest&* AND process.command_line:*&p\=* AND process.command_line:*&c\=* AND process.command_line:*&k\=*)`
